name: BɐckRoom Bubble Blopper
description:
Backroom Bubble Blopper is a puzzle arcade shooter game.

An exciting Puzzle Game where you race the clock to burst all the bubbles and earn a greater score !

______________________________________

Features :

  • Intuitive inputs
  • Arcade Game
  • Light Puzzle Mechanic

______________________________________

This game was made during 4 days by 3 students from e-artsup Paris, during a GameJam.

The goal was to make a game with the theme of the Arcade.

GAME ARTISTS :

Lycan Pascanet (3D assets , Shader)

Logan Cohen (3D environnement, UI)

CREATIVE CODING :

Enzo Talard (Programming)
